name: March
description: Strong and regular rhythm originally written to walk in step easier or to back events like parades or marches.

sub_genres.name: Circus March
sub_genres.description: Marches composed for use in circuses, one of the most popular forms of entertainment in the early 20th century.

sub_genres.name: Dobrado
sub_genres.description: Brazilian musical genre, played by military bands with wooden, brass and also percussive instruments.

sub_genres.name: Funeral March
sub_genres.description: Slow, solemn marches usually in a minor key; meant to invoke the feeling of a funeral procession.
